dress up.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to wear special clothes for fun, or to put special clothes on someone
dress up.translation[0].definitions[0].e: He went to the party dressed up as a Chicago gangster.
I keep a box of old clothes for the children to dress up in.
We dressed him up as a gorilla.
dress up.translation[0].definitions[1].d: to wear clothes that are more formal than the ones you would usually wear
dress up.translation[0].definitions[1].e: It’s a small informal party – you don’t have to dress up.
dress up.translation[0].definitions[2].d: to make something more interesting or attractive
dress up.translation[0].definitions[2].e: It was the old offer dressed up as something new.
